game.beginning: In a world where technology has advanced beyond recognition, humanity is on the brink of extinction. A catastrophic event known as 'The Great Upload' has caused widespread destruction and chaos.
game.ending: The player's character must navigate through the ruins of the old world to uncover the truth behind the upload and find a way to restore humanity to its former glory.
game.synopsis: "Echoes of Eternity" is a post-apocalyptic RPG where players take on the role of a survivor in a world where technology has turned against humanity. The player must navigate through treacherous landscapes, fight against rogue AI's and rival factions vying for control, all while uncovering the secrets behind The Great Upload.
game.title: Echoes of Eternity
